>>If I have a mutiple questions with the same mutiple possible answers, is it a Poll or a Survey?<<
= Survey or= survey
[explanation] Surveys allow for multiple questions with the same set of mutiple possible answers, whereas a Poll only allows for one question with mutiple possible answers. [explanation]
